=== About Me ===

Hi, I am a technologist, programmer & ubuntu fanatic.

=== Ubuntu community contributions ===

 {*} Founder & Admin of <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WestBangalTeam|Ubuntu WestBengal(India) LoCo Team Site]]</nowiki>

*** I take care of every aspect of the site as my main responsibility is attend and plan events statewide, contact and work with LUGs (Linux Users Groups) and other local groups, and act as the public face of the Ubuntu community in WestBengal.

 {*} Founder & Admin of <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/milky-moorhen| Milky-Moorhen core Team]]</nowiki>
*** Driver, Maintainer & packager for main repositories of Milky-Moorhen project.

 {*} Active Member on <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/users/11112/khurshid-alam|askubuntu]]</nowiki>
*** I have been a askubuntu member for almost 2 years. Some of my popular questions & answer are:
1. <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/questions/161155/how-to-create-a-ppa-for-c-program| How to create a PPA for C++ program?]]</nowiki>
2. <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/questions/143192/how-can-i-replace-lightdm-with-mdm| How can I replace LightDM with “MDM”?]]</nowiki>

 {*} Documentaion:
*** Ubuntu Community Wiki:
1. <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/SyncEvolution|Sync google calander with evolution with syncevolution.]]</nowiki> Check progress <nowiki>[[https://www.rememberthemilk.com/home/sunnysigara/32785085/|here]]</nowiki>.

 {*} Support:
*** Bugs: Repoted, commented & provide insight on <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/~khurshid-alam/+affectingbugs|ubuntu bugs.]]</nowiki>
*** Translation: Member of <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~lp-l10n-ben| Launchpad Bengali Translators team]]</nowiki> & helped translate Ubuntu in Bengali.

=== Future Plans ===

* Find More Volunteers for <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WestBangalTeam|Ubuntu WestBengal Loco Team.]]</nowiki>
* Become an admin of Ubuntu India Loco Team & advocate/promote Ubuntu across the country through social media.
* Create a online Ubuntu eBooks library(scanned copy books I own) & share books online free of cost (legally).
* Upgade Milky-Moorhen repo to latest ubuntu release.
* Create a comprehensive easy to understand syncevolution wiki for EDS, Akonadi, Caldav/Carddav, SyncMl backend.
